entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story. He is described as opening his eyes and standing in a familiar square.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A person mentioned by Harry, who is referred to as the Secret-Keeper of Number Twelve.

relationships.description: Harry mentions Dumbledore in the story, referring to him as the Secret-Keeper of Number Twelve.
Harry and another person visit Number Twelve, which is mentioned by Dumbledore as its Secret-Keeper.
